name: Witch Trip 2
description:
During quarantine last year I seriously jumped back into working on Witch Trip again. Since then work has been unstable and personal issues have kept me from working on it more. Feel free to give it a try and let me know what you think!

Controls - 

Esc - Pause

Z - Flap - to gain vertical momentum (hold left or right to gain momentum in that direction as well)

X - Air Dash - in the direction you are holding

C - Camera Flash - Use up a special charge to negate hazards around you (and puts the picture you took to the pause screen! This was the last thing I added, and was broken when I recorded the video above)

Shift - Slow time - you have 9 seconds of bullet time, recharges when not being used.

Arrow Keys - Changes the direction of flap and air dash
1 day/night that loops. Enjoy the boss fight!!
